column5: Whenever I warm up my frying pan I get the staredown.  Casey and Baxter(the son's dog) are fed better than the Queen. The 2 have good taste too!  Nothing like a perch dinner to keep us healthy..
Nice looking meal! Looks like those fillets came off of some decent perch!
Great looking dogs and perch taste great.
They know you're an easy mark.
They know you're an easy mark. Yuup!   I also know that a regular diet of real fish and meat will make for long healthy lives
Is that lard?! Cause if it is...  your healthy diet is a little off the mark.. j/k
Who ever said "dumb animals" never owned a dog LOL.

HAHA! Wow I thought that was just a Labrador thing!  I get the same look when working from home, my 2 yr old black lab is a retrieving freak and doesn't get why when I'm home I'm not throwing something for her HAHA!
Either that's a tiny pan or those were some biiig perch.
Left front burner. 8 inch pan.  Ok, now Im hungry. Wheres the canned sliced taters and salsa?
Left front burner. 8 inch pan.  Ok, now Im hungry. Wheres the canned sliced taters and salsa? 10" pan Taters were already fried and in the oven
Is that lard?! Cause if it is...  your healthy diet is a little off the mark.. j/k Strictly oil. Haven't bought lard in nearly 30 years
Who ever said "dumb animals" never owned a dog LOL. I forgot, you've met my son

Strictly oil. Haven't bought lard in nearly 30 years Why is it science keeps proving some of the best tasting things our parents got to eat get taken away from us. WELL NO MORE I am going to eat lard till it kills me because it makes things taste that good.   Art
I digress, peanut oil is the absolute tops for frying fish, and with a lot less trans fats....  Now if your eating a shore lunch, well then, break out the smoked bacon fat!!!!!
Actually cooking with lard sounds real good; http://www.foodandwine.com/articles/lard-the-new-health-food
Does not mean I don't save my bacon drippings to mix in with my frying oil
Strictly oil. Haven't bought lard in nearly 30 years  Bah I'm just jealous..  It looks delicious Bruce!
After reading that article I'll be looking for some real, non hydrogenated lard for my next fry!!!!
I have a yellow lab that I swear is one chromosome away from being a seagull. Opening our frig door is like throwing French fries in a McDonalds parking lot.  That perch looks awesome!

I have a yellow lab that I swear is one chromosome away from being a seagull. Opening our frig door is like throwing French fries in a McDonalds parking lot.  That perch looks awesome!  Ya my black lab was the same. Man I miss that dog.

While my lab was good at the cabinet noises I have a red tick coon hound that really tests the limits. I can put the dog outside eat a few jelly beans, let him back in and he will come over and look at me and then check the coffee table for his jelly bean. He has one heck of a nose for sure to watch him run the farm for scent is a pleasure to watch.   Art
